name: Stay Alive On The Tank: Explosive Shells In The Darkness
name_original: Stay Alive On The Tank: Explosive Shells In The Darkness
description:
You will have to fight on tanks using various bonuses that are scattered on the map. Invite your friends to the online pvp mode, score more points and unlock new levels, customize your tank, and win. The game has various modes.

Game Modes

Survival

Survive on a map where mines are scattered, on a minefield. Also, in this mode, unique rewards and specific tasks are waiting for you. Various quests and obstacles, for overcoming which you will get points.

Cooperative game mode

Play together with your friends and pass the cards in the cooperative. Act together, a lot depends on the actions of a joint team. Fight in a cooperative against AI. Capture and retake the territory. Build walls, traps and improve your skills with each new level.

Classic Multiplayer mode

All against all. Get the maximum number of points by destroying all your opponents. There are no rules! You can fight with your friends online. Earning points together.


Bonuses
Collect bonuses from the airdrop or get them for the points scored in the round, use bonuses to improve the characteristics of the tank and restore HP.



Different types of obstacles
On your way there will be turrets with missiles, exploding walls and secret obstacles that you will learn about during the game.

Airdrops
Each airdrop is a plane in the air that you will see. There is a valuable cargo on board! Your task is to get to the airdrop faster than the enemy. This has a strategic impact!

Destruction and Map Editor
Completely destructible environment. And the map editor that will be available in multiplayer, with its help you can create your own unique levels for passing together with friends.



A little more you can find out in our future Devlog, follow the news and have a nice game! Add to the wishlist and comment!
